extendedInfo.description: This app provides you with real-time access to breaking news,weather,sports, politics and more straight from the KCCI news team.  Whether you're in downtown Des Moines, up in Ames, or anywhere in central Iowa, you'll be connected to what's happening whenever you're away from Channel 8 on TV. Features: - Breaking news notifications sent directly to your mobile device. - Watch live breaking news when it happens and get live updates from our reporters right from the scene. - Get current weather conditions, hourly and the 5-day forecasts from Storm Team 8 meteorologists. - Our interactive radar lets you zoom in to the street level and see storms as they approach your home. Move around and see snow, storm warnings and lightning. - Politics from city hall to the state capitol reported by the KCCI newsroom. - Email your own photos and videos with u local and your content could be used on KCCI.com and on NewsChannel 8 newscasts on TV! - Follow latest news on the Iowa Hawkeyes, ISU Cyclones, Iowa Cubs, and more of your favorite sports teams. - Submit breaking news tips to our newsroom right from the app.

reviews.title: Slide show
reviews.comment: Why does it lock up my new s4 on the slide shows. Please fix. Ihave to take battery out to unlock the phone. And get rid of the comments
reviews.author: Matt Matz

reviews.title: Awful!
reviews.comment: New version constantly crashes n now fails the ad network detector. AdMob was never a part of this app until this update. The ability to comment on stories was a stupid idea. The comment section is now filled with racist or derogatory comments and flaming of other commenters by a handful of hateful people. The spelling and grammer has always been terrible but that\'s not the apps fault.  I would give it negative stars if I could. The app has been removed from my devices until Admob is removed and bugs fixed.
reviews.author: Shawn Morgan

reviews.title: Doesn\'t open
reviews.comment: With the new update the only thing I see is a black screen.  Unistalling.
reviews.author: Tricia Cunningham

reviews.title: Take comments off
reviews.comment: I think if people don\'t have anything nice to say they should keep their mouth shut.  I don\'t like the new comments section.   Just a place for people to be rude, opinionated and racist.   Take it off please.
reviews.author: Wendy Beckman

reviews.title: Crashes... Won\'t open, slow..
reviews.comment: Besides the technical issues they carry a lot of scare/snare ads for virus protection... When it works,  the content is great.
reviews.author: retsoftam

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Whenever I get texts or notification it resets to homepage....
reviews.author: Felicia Twiselton

reviews.title: Gr8
reviews.comment: Gr8

reviews.title: Way to go...
reviews.comment: New update crashes instantly. Nice.

reviews.title: Ok app for news, don\'t like banner ads
reviews.comment: I like the news i get, i don\'t like the new banner ads in the middle of the news stories. They are too easy to click on when scrolling which gets frustrating if you want to see more stories.
reviews.author: stacy monroe

reviews.title: BEST NEWS & WEATHER APP IN THE STATE OF IOWA
reviews.comment: Used to use accuweather for radar and weather forecast but since the latest update it lags so bad and most of time will not even down load. And channel 13who app - a 5 year old half witted monkey could of put the app together better :-P B-)

reviews.title: Ads
reviews.comment: You hit a ad every time you scroll down. And then it downloads something.

reviews.title: Great!

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: This site is safe thank you for changing your app I decided to give you another chance & glad I did.Your graphics are better & no longer following the locations of our phones,Thanks for doing the right thing!!!

reviews.comment: Actually works better than CNN app ... which is a little sad :/  Wish there was an exclusive section for local news only, but otherwise no complaints.
